Entry.JapaneseText: ネコ好きの じいさんの家
ネコ好きの じいさんの家
港なら、そこの階段を降りて、 道なりに行けばわかるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you head down those stairs and follow the road ahead, you can reach the port.
Soldiers? I haven't seen them, have you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、かくれんぼ大好き!!
広場？ お菓子でも配ってるの？ だったら、ボクも行く!!
Entry.EnglishText: Plaza? Is someone giving out candy? If so, I wanna come and get some too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様の儀式って、 おいしいお菓子がもらえる？ だったら、ボクも行く！
Entry.EnglishText: Are there going to be tasty candies in the Queen's ceremony? If so, then I wanna go there!

Entry.JapaneseText: 母ちゃんは旅の人には 親切にしろって言ったけど、 ガジュマは別なんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me that travelers are really kind people, but Gajumas are different!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>？ そういうのは海で働いてる人に 聞けばいいんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>? Maybe people who work on the sea would know better.

Entry.JapaneseText: 母ちゃんは旅の人には 親切にしろって言ったけど、 ガジュマは別なんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me that travelers are really kind people, but Gajumas are different!

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、ガジュマなんて 大ッキライなんだ！
お菓子も取り上げられたし、 ボクたちヒューマと見た目も 全然ちがうしさ！
Entry.EnglishText: They took away my candy and said all Humas look the same anyway!

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウンへ ようこそいらっしゃいました！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome to our bright and sunny town, Sunnytown!

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅の人には親切にしなさいって 母ちゃんが言ってた。 大事なシューニューゲンなんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: My mom told me to be kind to travelers because they're our sauce of in cam.

Entry.JapaneseText: 定期船に乗りに来たのかい？ 乗り場は街の東にあるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you here to get a ship? If so, just head east and you'll find the port.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこの出口から出て 西に向かう道が テルアラ街道だね。
Entry.EnglishText: If you head out of that entrance over there, you'll find yourself in Tel'alla Highway.

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、病人かい？ そりゃ、大変だ。
すぐに、宿屋で 休ませてあげなきゃね！
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry and get them to the Inn so they can get some rest!

Entry.JapaneseText: 人を探しているのかい？ 家の中とか、物かげとか、 よく探してみたかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you looking for someone? Have you tried searching inside houses or in the shadows?

Entry.JapaneseText: 思わぬところに 隠れ場所ってのは あるからねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: Who knows? You might find them hiding somewhere unexpected...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、みんな広場に行くって 言ってたけど、何かあるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone said that they're heading to the town square for some reason, I wonder what's happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: 水やりが終わったら 行ってみよう……
Entry.EnglishText: I should check it out once I've finished watering these plants.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様の即位の儀式か…… 人が大勢集まるんだろうね。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like a large crowd had gathered to attend the Queen's inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウンでもやってくれると この街も繁盛して、助かるんだけど。 ま、無理か？
Entry.EnglishText: It would be great if such a thing happened here so it can thrive, but perhaps that's impossible?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが通ると、 羽やら毛やらで、 道路が汚れるんだよな。
Entry.EnglishText: With those Gajumas coming and going, roads get littered with their fur, feathers and whatnot.

Entry.JapaneseText: こっちも掃除が大変だよ！ ああ、水まかなきゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: And cleaning the roads have become a hassle! Watering has too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 前は気にもしなかったけど、 ヒューマとガジュマが同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>、 だなんて思えないよな？
Entry.EnglishText: It never occured to me until now, but to think that Gajumas and humas are both <Yellow>people<White>... Who would've thought?

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、そうだろ？ イヌとネコを同じだなんて、 言うヤツはいないもんな？
Entry.EnglishText: It makes sense though, doesn't it? No one in this world would say that dogs and cats are the same.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎日、手入れしてやらないと、 潮風にさらされて 枯れてしまうのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't tend to these plants daily, they'll end up withering in the sea breeze.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールでは 種族間の衝突が絶えず、 危険な状況だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The interspecies conflict in Minal is steadily getting more and more dangerous.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらくミナール方面へは 行かないようにするんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I advice you not to head towards the Minal region at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 謎の地鳴りについては、 軍を挙げて調査中だ。 自宅で発表を待つように。
Entry.EnglishText: The whole army is currently investigating the source of this earthquake. Please stay and wait for announcements at home.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、この街は特別警戒中だ。 騒ぎの原因となった者を 現在、捜索中だ。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is currently under special alert. We are searching for troublemakers as of this moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、この街は特別警戒中だ。 ヒューマの外出は 控えてもらいたい。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is currently under special alert. We advise you Humas to refrain from stepping outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: このあいだ、軍の船が 仲間の兵士たちを乗せて、 ミナールに向かったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Recently some ship containing soldiers departed for Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカからも軍船が出たと聞くが、 一体ミナールで何があったんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard some ship departed from Balka too, what on earth is happening in Minal?

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、ここんところ 落ち着かないな……
Entry.EnglishText: Sheesh, this place doesn't calm down at all...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前みたいにのんびりと 暮らしたいよ、まったく。
Entry.EnglishText: I just want everything to be peaceful like before...

Entry.JapaneseText: おとなしくできないガジュマも 家の中に入ってるこったな。
Entry.EnglishText: I bet Gajumas who can't sit still are staying at home too.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは部屋に入ってな。 モメごと起こしたくないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Those Humas won't cause any trouble as long as they're inside their rooms... right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700004f>くそっ…… どこ行っちまったんだ、あの娘は！
<voice:17000050>ミリッツァより先に、 さっきの女の人を見つけないと!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000050>We have to find her before Militsa does!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000054>このくらい、 何でもありません！
<voice:17000056>おとなしく 寝ていればいいものを。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000056>Be a good little girl and stay down next time.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000059>邪魔をするな。 おまえたちに私は倒せない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000059>Don't interfere. I won't lose to the likes of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700005a>……どうすりゃいいんだ。 <Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>って何なんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700005A>...What should we do? What the heck is this <Yellow>Force of Prism<White>, anyway?
<voice:1700005B>Maybe it's the ability to create illusions?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700005c>あれは、幻なんかじゃ なかったぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700005C>Funny, they don't feel like illusions to me!
<voice:1700005D>What about the ability to create clones?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000060><Yellow>虹<White>……もしかして光？ 光かもしれません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000060>"<Yellow>Prism<White>"... Something to do with light, perhaps?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000062>ミリッツァの<Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>は、 光を操って、幻のようなものを見せる 能力なんじゃないでしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000062>Militsa may be using light refraction to create clones through her Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000064>おそらくミリッツァは、 フォルスの塊に光を重ねて、 それを自分の分身のように 操っているんだと思います。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000064>I think Militsa is molding fragments of light from her Force into images, thus creating clones of herself.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000065><Annie>の仮説が正しければ、 あの分身は幻に過ぎない。 いくら倒しても意味がない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000065>If <Annie>'s theory is correct, these clones are nothing but illusions. There's no sense in attacking them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000066>ミリッツァの本体を見つけて 直接叩かない限り、 奴を倒す事はできない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000066>We can't defeat Militsa unless we're able to identify her real body.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:17000067>だけど、あれだけ完璧な分身じゃ、 見分けるなんてできっこないよ。 フォルス反応も全員にあるし……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000067>But they're perfect copies, we can't tell them apart. Even their Force signatures are identical...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700006a>光で幻を見せている <Yellow>虹のフォルス<White>攻略のカギは、 やはり……光。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700006A>The Force of Prism manipulates light to create illusions, so the solution must be...light itself.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700006b>幻が光によって作られているなら、 周囲の光を妨げれば、幻は消えます！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700006B>If light is the source of the illusions, then we just have to cut that source off!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700006c>つまり分身が消えて 本体だけが残るってコトだネ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700006C>In other words, the clones will vanish and only her true body will remain!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700006d>なるほど…… ミリッツァの分身を消すためには、 光を遮る方法を考えればいいわけだな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700006D>All right... We must think of something to disrupt the light and stop Militsa.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700006e>蒸気はどうだ？ オレの氷と、<Mao>の炎……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1700006E>How about steam? With my ice and <Mao>'s fire...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1700006f>……やってみる価値は ありそうだな。
<voice:17000072>あいつ……街中を巻き込んででも さっきの女の子を探すつもりだぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:17000072>Dammit... She'll destroy the entire town to find that girl!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000000>いつもと変わらないみたいだけど…… ホントにここが<Blue>幻の島<White>なのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000000>Everything seems business as usual here. Is this really the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000001>オレたちの考えが正しければ、 きっと何かが見つかるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000001>If we're on the right track, then we'll definitely find something here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700003b>どういう事なんだ!! なぜ、我々ヒューマだけが 軍の監視を受けなきゃならない!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700003B>What is the meaning of this!? Why is the military only monitoring Huma!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700003c>貴様らヒューマによる ガジュマへの差別や攻撃が カレギアの秩序を乱している。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700003C>It's because of you Huma that we Gajuma have been subjected to discrimination and even assault. You disrupted the order of our kingdom!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700003d>よって、治安が回復するまで、 ヒューマを監視せよという命令が 下ったのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700003D>Consequently, we've been given orders to place you under surveillance until peace and order have been restored!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700003e>ヒューマどもは自分勝手だからな！ 誰かに見張られているぐらいが ちょうどいいんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700003E>You guys brought this upon yourselves! Being watched by someone is the least you deserve!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700003f>なんだと、ガジュマのくせに！ 調子に乗るなっ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700003F>You have some nerve, for a Gajuma! Watch your mouth or you'll be sorry!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000040>今のような差別発言を 繰り返すようならば、 拘禁、抑留もあり得るぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000040>If discriminatory language such as that is going to become a pattern, then you might face confinement or even imprisonment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000041>自分たちがガジュマだからって 連中だけかばうなんて差別だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000041>You Gajuma are just covering for each other! Isn't that discrimination too!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000042>差別する兵隊なんていらねえよっ!! すぐに帰れっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000042>I don't want a military that's going to be prejudiced against me! Get lost!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000043>そうだ、帰れー！ この街から出ていけー！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000043>Yeah, leave! Get the hell outta this town!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000045>おまえらこそ、 この街から出てけっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000045>You freaks are the ones who need to leave! We don't want you in this town!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000047>……これ以上、 混乱が大きくなっては、面倒だ！ ヒューマどもを全員、引っ捕えろ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000047>...There's going to be trouble if we let this commotion get any worse! Arrest all Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000048>……ど、どうなってるんだ？ 思念は消えたんじゃないのかよ？ なあ、<Eugene>!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000048>...W-what's goin' on? Didn't the scourge disappear? Didn't it, <Eugene>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000049>ああ、消えているはずだ。 少なくとも、俺には もう思念の影響はない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000049>Yes, it should have. It isn't affecting me any longer, at the very least.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700004a>じゃあ、さっきの人たちは どうして……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700004A>Then why were those people just now...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700004b>争いは何も思念のせいだけでは なかったのかもしれんな……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700004B>Maybe the scourge wasn't the only cause behind all of this...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700004c>だとしたら……まさか、 この街以外でも……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700004C>If that's true, then...could it be just as bad in other places as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700004d>それはわからない。 だが、あり得ない話ではない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700004D>I'm not sure, but we can't pretend that it isn't a distinct possibility.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700004e>……これじゃあ、 種族の共存なんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700004E>How can we co-exist when things are like this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700004f>何だよ……おれたちは どうすりゃいいんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700004F>Damn...what the hell are we supposed to do now!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000053>世界中で、ガジュマとヒューマが 戦いを始めようとしてるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000053>Fights are about to break out between Huma and Gajuma all over the world!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000054>他でも同じような事が!? 思念は浄化されたんじゃないのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000054>It's the same everywhere else? We didn't purify the scourge, then!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000055>とにかく、ぼくと一緒に行こう！ 街の外で待ってるよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000055>Just come with me for the time being! I'll be waiting outside the city!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000086><Veigue>、ナニやってんだ？ 置いてっちまうぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000086><Veigue>, what're you doing? You're gonna get left behind, man.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
